name: Frontline: Panzers & Generals Vol. I
description:
Experience an action-packed World War 2 strategy game that puts you in command of the German Wehrmacht in an epic battle for the domination of the Eastern Front.

"Lead your forces through epic battles as you carefully aim your targets and counter-attack. Strategically coordinate your Squads and utilize special abilities to gain an advantage over your enemies. Study their tactics to ensure victory!"

"Frontline: Panzers & Generals" is an exciting Fast-Paced hex-based strategy game set in World War 2, featuring real historical units, maps and locations. Take command of your army and lead them to victory by employing any strategy of your choice! Outwit and outmaneuver your opponents to claim objectives and ultimately emerge victorious.

Units become even more powerful and unlock new, invaluable abilities as they gain experience in battle; these new behaviors will be essential in ensuring victory: Camouflage, Sabotage, Over-watch, Smoke, AT grenades, Artillery barrage, Shell Shock, Transport, Special Panzers, APCR, Suppressed, Routed, M.I.A, K.I.A, Infantry Charge.

Take command of your military force and plan your strategy to achieve victory in this exciting world-at-war strategy game!
Lead your troops to victory and secure your place in history!

FEATURES:
✔Massive weapons arsenal: 200+ unique units
✔Axis Campaigns
✔Level up & Active Abilities
✔Realistic topography maps
✔Historical & Alternative History Battles
✔Reinforcements
✔Zoom controls
✔HD Graphics
✔No turn limit
✔Localization: En, De, Ru, It, Fr, Jp, SP, Por, zh-cn
✔PC only
✔All DLCs are free

The "Frontline Games Series" is an independent, solo development effort, and I am always grateful for your feedback and comments.
If you are a player of Turn-based Strategy & tactics Hex-grid WW2 Wargames, this game might be for you!
